statements: SELECT * FROM food_consumption;
SELECT food_name, food_category FROM food_consumption;
SELECT food_name, consumption_rate FROM food_consumption WHERE food_category = 'Vegetables';
SELECT food_name, consumption_date FROM food_consumption WHERE consumption_rate > 3.5;
SELECT food_name, consumption_rate FROM food_consumption ORDER BY consumption_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_consumption WHERE consumption_rate > 10 ORDER BY food_name ASC, consumption_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT food_name, AVG(consumption_rate) AS avg_rate FROM food_consumption WHERE consumption_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY food_name ORDER BY avg_rate DESC
SELECT food_name, food_category, COUNT(*) AS total_consumption FROM food_consumption GROUP BY food_name, food_category HAVING total_consumption > 3 ORDER BY food_category
SELECT DISTINCT food_category FROM food_consumption ORDER BY food_category
SELECT food_name, consumption_rate, consumption_date FROM food_consumption WHERE consumption_rate BETWEEN 5.5 AND 9.5 ORDER BY consumption_date ASC
SELECT * FROM FoodConsumptionPatterns;
SELECT id, food_name, consumption_amount, consumption_date FROM FoodConsumptionPatterns WHERE consumption_amount > 100;
SELECT food_name, consumption_date, consumption_amount FROM FoodConsumptionPatterns WHERE food_name = 'Apple' ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, production_location FROM SustainableFoodProduction WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SustainableFoodProduction ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodConsumptionPatterns WHERE consumption_amount > 100 ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT food_name, consumption_amount FROM FoodConsumptionPatterns WHERE consumption_date >= '2022-01-01' AND consumption_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM SustainableFoodProduction WHERE production_location = 'Europe' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM SustainableFoodProduction WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT food_name, consumption_amount, consumption_date FROM FoodConsumptionPatterns WHERE consumption_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY consumption_amount DESC, consumption_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM FoodConsumption WHERE id = 1;
SELECT food_name, quantity FROM FoodConsumption WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM FoodConsumption ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT food_name, quantity FROM FoodConsumption WHERE consumption_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, food_name FROM FoodConsumption WHERE food_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM FoodConsumption WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY consumption_date DESC
SELECT food_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM FoodConsumption GROUP BY food_name HAVING total_quantity > 500
SELECT id, food_name, consumption_date FROM FoodConsumption WHERE consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM FoodConsumption WHERE food_name LIKE '%apple%' AND quantity < 50
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM FoodConsumption
SELECT * FROM FoodConsumptionPatterns;
SELECT foodID, quantity, dateConsumed FROM FoodConsumptionPatterns WHERE userID = 1;
SELECT itemName, category, calories FROM FoodItems WHERE category = 'Vegetables' ORDER BY itemName ASC;
SELECT trendName, description, startDate FROM ConsumptionTrends WHERE startDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT planName, productionGoal, deadline FROM ProductionPlanning ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodItems
SELECT itemName, calories FROM FoodItems WHERE category = 'Vegetables'
SELECT userID, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM FoodConsumptionPatterns GROUP BY userID
SELECT trendName, description, startDate FROM ConsumptionTrends WHERE startDate >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY startDate DESC
SELECT planName, productionGoal, deadline FROM ProductionPlanning WHERE productionGoal > 1000
SELECT * FROM food_consumption_patterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT food_type, quantity FROM food_consumption_patterns WHERE date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT user_name, user_age, user_location FROM user_profiles WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM food_items WHERE item_category = 'Fruits';
SELECT trend_description FROM food_trends WHERE trend_category = 'Sustainable';
SELECT * FROM food_consumption_patterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, date, food_type, quantity FROM food_consumption_patterns WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT trend_id, trend_description FROM food_trends ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_age, user_location FROM user_profiles WHERE user_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM food_items WHERE item_category = 'Vegetables' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
